title: How many Deep Fried NFTs will be available?
content: Only 2,222 Deep Fried NFTs will ever be minted and released.

title: How much will a Deep Fried NFT cost?
content: A Deep Fried NFT will cost 1 SOL, and will remain that price throughout the minting period. Our distribution will be fair without any tiers or reservations.

title: Where can I buy or sell my Deep Fried NFTs afrer mint?
content: Deep Fried NFTs will be available on secondary marketplaces shortly after selling out. We'll be approaching markets like Solanart, SolSea, Magic Eden, and DigitalEyes to discuss which location will best fit our project.

title: Will you host any giveaways?
content: Yes! We'll be hosting giveaways on our Twitter and in our Discord. Make sure you follow us for a chance to win!
